channel.title: MacOSX on Digital River

item.title: Installing VirtualBox 7.1.0 on macOS and installing a Linux guest machine with Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS
item.description: Gist: Developer Notes: Installing VirtualBox 7.1.0 on macOS and installing a Linux guest machine with Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS Host: macOS with M2 Silicon Download Mac Silicon (determine hardware): uname -a ... arm64 # Macbook M2 is based on AARCH64 (which is now called ARM64) Ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) - Daily Build: https://cdimage.ubuntu.com/jammy/daily-live/current/ Use the one that says “64-bit ARM (ARMv8/AArch64) desktop image / For 64-bit ARMv8 processors and above.
